data.title: Sharon Brown, AGPCNP
data.text:
Areas of Professional Interest

I specialize in geriatric care. I strive to holistically treat the mind, body and spirit of my patients. I love caring for adults over the age of 65. My practice is focused on adults and the geriatric population. I hope to weave palliative medicine into my patient contacts, focusing on the individual patient’s goals of care.

Hello, I’m Sharon

After living in the high desert of Northern Nevada for 20+ years, the weather, people, tulips and especially Salish Sea are welcome changes. I enjoy traveling and exploring our beautiful island with my husband and two elderly dogs and brand-new puppy.
